availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky stone mason. Kentucky native. Married Mary M. Whiteman Pedigo in 1855.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 99. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 85. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Third Congressional District, Warren County, 1864. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Marriages, Warren County, Ancestry, 1855. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Elk Spring, p. 18.
